Sentiment Detail: - **Strong regulatory framework**: DC has established comprehensive regulations and programs supporting renewable energy development through RPS and Solar for All initiatives. - **Significant growth**: The district added 2,337 new solar systems in 2021 alone, demonstrating strong momentum in renewable energy development. - **Active support**: Multiple programs and substantial funding are available to promote energy development, including streamlined interconnection processes and community solar initiatives.
